product_name: Big Agnes Fairview 1 Tent - 2013 Special Buy
long_description: Escape on a solitary backpacking adventure with the Big Agnes Fairview 3-season tent. Lightweight and compact, it provides enough room for you and your gear but doesn't weigh down your pack.
short_description: Escape on a solitary backpacking adventure with the Big Agnes Fairview 3-season tent. Lightweight and compact, it provides enough room for you and your gear but doesn't weigh down your pack.
